email_content:
Hi Mark,

As discussed, here are the key points for the Q2 budget forecast:

• We anticipate roughly a 5% increase in raw material costs driven by current market conditions.
• Negotiated supplier price lists have been updated following our recent discussions; please incorporate these figures when finalizing the projections.
• A planned shift toward more sustainable materials may introduce additional cost pressure—factor this into the model.
• Detailed figures, supplier breakdowns, and the latest spreadsheets are available in the “Q2 Budget Forecast” page in my Personal Workspace on Notion. Let me know if you have any trouble accessing it.

Feel free to reach out if you need anything else.

Thanks,
Jane
